entries.defenses_detail: Contribute 10 or more resources or components to the village defenses crafting project. The "Village Defenses" schematic has the details of what items are needed.
entries.shields_detail: Contribute 20 or more resources or components to the village shields crafting project.
entries.get_defense_schematics_detail: Talk to the droid QT-QC and get the schematics needed for the village defenses.
entries.get_shield_schematics_detail: Talk to the droid QT-QC and get the schematics needed for the village shields.
entries.defenses_main_detail: Contribute crafted items to help build the village defenses.
entries.shields_main_detail: Contribute crafted items to help build the village shields.
